verses.name: Psalms 122:1
verses.text: I was glad when they said unto me, Let us go into the house of the Lord.

verses.name: Psalms 122:2
verses.text: Our feet shall stand within thy gates, O Jerusalem.

verses.name: Psalms 122:3
verses.text: Jerusalem is builded as a city that is compact together:

verses.name: Psalms 122:4
verses.text: Whither the tribes go up, the tribes of the Lord, unto the testimony of Israel, to give thanks unto the name of the Lord.

verses.name: Psalms 122:5
verses.text: For there are set thrones of judgment, the thrones of the house of David.

verses.name: Psalms 122:6
verses.text: Pray for the peace of Jerusalem: they shall prosper that love thee.

verses.name: Psalms 122:7
verses.text: Peace be within thy walls, and prosperity within thy palaces.
